data.title: DAVID FISHER
data.meta_description: David M. Fisher, 47, of Sardis, OH, passed away Tuesday, February 4, 2020, at his home. He was born March 13, 1973 in Cuyahoga Falls, Ohio, a son of Sandra Kirkland Thomas and the late Edward Thomas. He was a lead installer for Dennis Miller Doors & Windows, Sardis, OH, where he was talented and [â€¦]
data.text:
He was born March 13, 1973 in Cuyahoga Falls, Ohio, a son of Sandra Kirkland Thomas and the late Edward Thomas.

He was a lead installer for Dennis Miller Doors & Windows, Sardis, OH, where he was talented and appreciated in the family business. He was a member of the Apostolic Christian Church, Sardis, OH.

Survivors include his wife, Valerie Fisher; two sons, Daniel and Justin Fisher, both of Sardis; a daughter, Kelly (Shawn) Curtis of Saginaw, MI; two sisters, Patricia Haby and Vicki Fisher, both of Cuyahoga Falls, OH; other step-siblings and nieces and nephews; an amazing uncle to any child; his biological father, Jack Heck; father- and mother-in-law, Denny and Doris Miller; brother-in-law, Stephen (Kati) Miller; sisters-in-law, Renee (Alan) Blough and Kristina (Jeb) Joos, all of Sardis, OH.

Family will receive friends on Saturday from 10:30 a.m. until time of service at 1 p.m. at Apostolic Christian Church, 49076 State Route 255, Sardis, with ministers of the church officiating.

Interment will follow in Apostolic Church Cemetery, Sardis.

Memorial contributions may be made to Apostolic Christian Church, 49076 State Route 255, Sardis, OH 43946.

Arrangements are entrusted to Grisell Funeral Home, Sardis, OH.

Sympathy expressions at grisellfuneralhomes.com.
